code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./AuthOptions.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AuthOptions(){const[formType,setFormType]=useState(null);const handleLoginClick=()=>{setFormType('login');};const handleCreateUserClick=()=>{setFormType('createUser');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"auth-button",onClick:handleLoginClick,children:"Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"auth-button",onClick:handleCreateUserClick,children:"Create User"})]}),formType==='login'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"auth-table",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username or Email"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"submit-button",children:"Log In"})})})]})}),formType==='createUser'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"auth-table",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tbody",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"submit-button",children:"Create User"})})})]})})]});}export default AuthOptions;
